features: ULTIMATE CLOSENESS – Schick Hydro Silk Sensitive Care Disposable Razors feature 5 Curve-Sensing blades with unique skin guards that smooth your skin throughout every stroke, helping to reduce irritation.
OUR SMOOTHEST GLIDE – Dermatologist-tested, water-activated Hydra-Boost serum helps the razor glide over your skin.
HYDRATION FOR SENSITIVE SKIN – Sensitive skin razor is formulated with a touch of green tea and chamomile, clinically proven to moisturize and help protect your sensitive skin against irritation.
GREAT FOR ON THE GO – Toss one in your bag to use as a travel razor.
EASY HANDLING & OPTIMAL CONTROL – Our ergonomic soft-touch razor handle features a comfortable rubber grip.
CONVENIENCE – Hydro Silk Disposable Razors can be recycled using our mail back program.
body.description: Now you can get a close, smooth shave with the convenience of a disposable razor, thanks to Schick Hydro Silk Sensitive Care Disposable Razors. This dermatologist-tested sensitive skin razor has 5 Curve-Sensing® blades for ultimate closeness, while following the natural contours of your body. Its water-activated Hydra-Boost™ serum is formulated with a touch of green tea and chamomile for our smoothest glide ever, plus it’s clinically proven to provide lasting hydration for up to 2 hours after shaving. Schick Hydro Silk Disposable Razors are perfect for home or on the go. Toss one in your bag to use as a travel razor. They’re just the right size for accessing hard-to-reach areas, and each blade includes unique skin guards to smooth skin and help prevent irritation. It also has a soft, rubber handle with grooved grips for optimal control of your shave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ridiculously overpriced here and in stores!
reviews.reviewText: If I didn't love these razors, I definitely wouldn't spend this kind of money on them. Unfortunately, they cost as much here as they do in Walmart. Not sure why they are sooooo expensive though?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These have always been my go to razors! I have sensitive skin & break out easily. These never leave a rash. Always a clean smooth shave! I recommend these to Everyone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best razor ever
reviews.reviewText: I have found my new razor. It works amazingly. Cuts the hair off the first time. No nicks or cuts. Just a smooth close shave. Definitely recommend

reviews.reviewText: These are my favorite razors always leave my legs feeling smooth! When I purchased them they were reasonably priced. Save me a trip to target.
